ingredients: 1 - 1" piece ginger, grated on a microplaneor very finely minced
1 clove garlic, grated on a microplane or very finely minced
1 tablespoon soy sauce (or coconut aminos for paleo)
3 tablespoons peanut butter (or almond butter for paleo)
1 English cucumber, sliced into thin rounds
¼ cup red onion, sliced very thin, preferably with a mandonlin
Sea salt and fresh cracked pepper, to taste
Sea salt and fresh cracked pepper, to taste
